subject: Re: website pages

Hi Leigh-Anne.

The Equipment Hire page has been updated.

I have added the 2 sections on the page for the Rollers an Skidsteers.

I've just copied the subtext but let me know what should be the text there.

Thanks!

Hi Chrissy and Blake.

I have added the two pages:
  • 12T Roller - https://hammerhire.com.au/12t-roller/
  • Posi Tracks - https://hammerhire.com.au/posi-tracks/

I am unsure though if they should be subpages and if so, what should be their parent pages? Please let me know so I can update quickly.

Also, the image you provided for Posi Tracks is too small so I looked online for the matching image but if you can provide a better image that would be great.

I have also added both in the mega menu separately and I am still looking for a solution on how to add a scroll on the mega menu for the rollers to be visible.

Regards,
Cindy

Hi Cindy, Not sure what happened to these - they were there last year. See below both pages to be added - please follow the same templates as the other machines.
  • 12t roller (1st photo)
Description The Cat® CS12 Vibratory Soil Compactor features a smooth drum and is ideally suited for granular soil applications or cohesive soil applications with the use of an optional padfoot shell kit. A reliable propel system improves performance and efficiency and compaction technology solutions help you reach target density faster. Weight - 12653 kg
  • Posi tracks (2nd photo)
Description Kubota's next-generation compact track loaders set unbeatable performance and productivity standards. Gaining attention for their exceptional lifting capacity and bucket breakout force, Kubota's impact track loaders are engineered to handle the toughest jobs in the harshest of conditions. Experience unmatched power, versatility and stability on your construction and landscaping projects with Kubota track loaders. Whether you're an owner-operator, contractor or hire company, Kubota has a compact track loader to suit your individual needs. Weight 3900kg - 4300kg Please use the same 'specs' as shown on the 'Siite Dumper' page for both the Roller and Posi Track. Blake Wilson Sales Manager HammerHire Mob: 0417 411 237 Email: blake@hammerhire.com.au 32 Williamson Rd , Ingleburn NSW 2565 http://www.hammerhire.com.au/ Leave us a Google review!

Hi Chrissy.

The menu doesn't appear to have the Skidsteers and Rollers item at the moment. We can add them for you and we will be needing the following items:
  • Menu items for Skidsteers
  • Menu items for Rollers
  • Featured images for the items that we will be adding to both menus.

Thank you.

Regards,
Cindy

Hello Chrissy.

Upon reviewing through Wayback Machine (link), we can't confirm what has been changed.

Are you able to provide us a reference on how the menu should appear?

Also, our team have noticed that those pages under skidsteers and rollers do not have featured images while the items on the current menu navigation are using the featured image.

I am still looking into this issue and will keep you updated once fixed.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Cindy

action.text: Glen Tenorio assigned to Cindy Valderama

full_threads.body:
hi, @cindy can you check this.

I’ve checked into it, including reviewing the Wayback Machine snapshot (link), but I still can’t confirm what’s changed—there’s no recent update history available, and I don’t have a clear record of the menu items that should be there.

If they have a prior reference or list of what should appear under the equipment hire pages, I can dig deeper or start restoring from backups.

Also, i noticed that those pages under skidsteers and rolers do not have featured images. The items on the current menu navigation are using the featured image.
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

Any update to this?

Kind Regards,

Chrissy Walker

CYBER SECURITY WARNING:

We will never email you advising a change in our bank account details. If you do receive an email advising a change in bank account details or requesting you to bank funds into an account you should telephone us. We will always telephone you to confirm any change in bank details and to confirm any bank details that you provide to us by email. Please telephone to confirm our banking details prior to making any payments.
